001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
009
010@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
011public final class OnlineRegime implements Regime {
012
013    @Override
014    public <E extends EstimationFunction> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer) {
015        for (int i = 0; i < trainingSet.size(); i++) {
016            optimizer.optimize(estimationFunction, trainingSet.subset(i, i + 1), objective);
017        }
018    }
019
020}
